quotes.quote: A well-armed man is a gentleman.
quotes.author: Thomas Jefferson

quotes.quote: The best defense is a good offense.
quotes.author: Sun Tzu

quotes.quote: A gun in the hand is better than a foot in the mouth.
quotes.author: Clint Eastwood

quotes.quote: Let the one who has no sword sell his cloak and buy one.
quotes.author: Luke 22:36

quotes.quote: The blessed Lord trains my hands for war and my fingers for battle.
quotes.author: Psalm 144:1

quotes.quote: For all who draw the sword will die by the sword.
quotes.author: Matthew 26:52
